column2: "Israelhen Solomon
"Dɛ wɔmfa nhu nyansa na nkyerɛkyerɛ; Dɛ wɔmfa nhu ntseasee nsɛm mu;"
"Dɛ wɔmfa nya nkyerɛkyerɛ wɔ enyansadze mu
column3: Wɔ ntseasee na atsɛmbu na nsɛntsenenee mu."

column2: "Dɛ wɔmfa nkyerɛ atsetsekwaa enyitsew
column3: Dɛ wɔmfa mma aberantsɛ nyimdzee na adwenmutsewee:"

column2: "Ama onyansafo eetsie
column3: na n'adzesua akɔ sor; Na onyimdzefo dze eenya apam pa:"

column2: "Dɛ wɔmfa nhu abɛbusɛm na akasabɛbu
"EWURADZE ho suro nye nyimdzee n'ahyɛse: Na nkwasea dze
"Me ba
column4: Na mma mmpow wo na ne mbra."

column2: "Na wɔbɛyɛ enyimnyam abɔtsir ama wo tsir
"Me ba
"Sɛ wɔ dɛ
"Ma yɛnkɛmemen hɔn enyikan dɛ samanadze
column4: dɛ hɔn a wosian kɔ adakamona mu;"

column2: "Na yebenya adze a ɔsom bo nyina
column3: Yɛdze asadze bɛhyehyɛ hɛn adan amaama;"

column2: "Bra
column3: fa woho bɔbɔ hɛnho; Na hɛn nyinara yebenya foto kor a:"

column2: "Me ba
column3: mma nnye hɔn ntu kwan; Twe w'anan fi hɔn kwan do:"

column2: "Na hɔn anan tu mbirika kɔ mbusu mu
column3: Na hɔn ho yɛ har ka bɔgya gu."

column2: "Na kwa ara na wosua efir
"Woyinom ara wohue hɔnankasa hɔn bɔgyaa gu
"Dɛm na obiara a ɔpɛ edzifodze n'akwan tse; Oyi ewuranom hɔn nkwa fi hɔ."
"Nyansa tseatsea mu dzendzen wɔ ɔbrɔn do: Ɔbɔ ne ndze mu wɔ papratamu;"
"Ɔkeka mu wɔ guado; Nkuropon ano
"Dabɛn ara na hom
column4: hom bɛpɛ ntsetsekwaadze ekodu? Na atwetwesifo enyi bɛgye atwetwesi mu

column2: "Hom ndan homho mma me nkaenyim: Hom nhwɛ
column4: Mebɛda me nsɛm edzi akyerɛ hom."

column2: "Osiandɛ mafrɛ na hom apow; Matsen me nsamu
column3: na nyimpa biara ammfa annyɛ hwee."

column2: "Na hom ebu m'apam nyina adze gyangyan
column3: Na hom ammfa me nkaenyim biara annyɛ hwee;"

column2: "Emi so mebɛserew wɔ hom mbusu da no mu; Da a hom suro bɛba no
"Da a hom suro bɛba dɛ ehum
column3: Na hom mbusu bɛba dɛ ekyinehyia mframa
column4: Da a ahohia na ahokyer bɛba hom do no a."

column2: "Ɔno na wobosu afrɛ me
"Osiandɛ wokyiir nyimdzee
column3: Na wɔannsan mu ennyi Nyankopɔn ho suro ntsi:"

column2: "Wɔammfa n'apam biara annyɛ hwee; Wobuu ne nkaenyim nyina enyimtsia:"
"Dɛm ntsi wobedzi hɔnankasa hɔn kwan do aba
column3: Na hɔnankasa hɔn nhyehyɛɛ amee hɔn."

column2: "Na mbatam hɔn ekyirsan boku hɔn
column3: Na nkwasea hɔn prɔmprɔmyɛ asɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na obiara a obetsie me no dze
column4: Na no ho adwe no dɛ onnkosuro mbusu biara."
